amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, up to $3,000,000 for Small and Medium Caliber Recoil Mitigation Technologies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4847 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4847 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S8682; text: CR S8682) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, up to $3,000,000 for Small and Medium Caliber Recoil Mitigation Technologies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4847 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4847 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Reed.
